description: Frozen boundary verification codes for X-3 Sovereign Succession Under Lineage. Per Q&A AQ1.

BOUNDARY_SIGNATURE_MISMATCH.description: CycleCommit or CycleStart signature verification failed under expected key.

BOUNDARY_STATE_MISSING_PENDING_SUCCESSOR.description: No pending_successor_key in committed state despite succession admitted in this cycle.

BOUNDARY_STATE_SPURIOUS_PENDING_SUCCESSO.description: Non-null pending_successor_key in committed state without any admitted succession.

BOUNDARY_STATE_CHAIN_MISMATCH.description: CycleStart identity_chain_tip_hash, identity_chain_length, or overlay_hash disagree with replay-reconstructed post-activation state.

succession_rejection_codes.INVALID_FIELD: S1 completeness gate — missing or malformed fields
succession_rejection_codes.SIGNATURE_INVALID: S3 Ed25519 signature verification under prior sovereign key
succession_rejection_codes.IDENTITY_CYCLE: S5 successor would create cycle in lineage
succession_rejection_codes.LINEAGE_FORK: S5 successor would create alternate root or fork
succession_rejection_codes.SUCCESSION_DISABLED: S6 constitutional compliance — succession not enabled
succession_rejection_codes.MULTIPLE_SUCCESSIONS_IN_CYCLE: S7 per-cycle uniqueness — only one succession per cycle

ratification_rejection_codes.INVALID_FIELD: R1 completeness — missing or malformed fields
ratification_rejection_codes.SIGNATURE_INVALID: R2 Ed25519 signature verification under active sovereign
ratification_rejection_codes.TREATY_NOT_SUSPENDED: R3 referenced treaty is not in SUSPENDED state
ratification_rejection_codes.DENSITY_MARGIN_VIOLATION: R4 ratification would violate density bound

authority_codes.PRIOR_KEY_PRIVILEGE_LEAK: Post-activation attempt by prior sovereign key to issue sovereign-signed artifact
authority_codes.SUSPENSION_UNRESOLVED: Attempt to issue new treaty grant while suspensions exist
